args: $json = Get-Content '.vscode\extensions.json' | ConvertFrom-Json; if ($json.recommendations) { $json.recommendations | ForEach-Object { code --install-extension $_ --force } }; if ($json.unwantedRecommendations) { $json.unwantedRecommendations | ForEach-Object { code --uninstall-extension $_ --force } }
